channelSelect.error: An error occurred. Make sure the bot has enough permissions to list the channels and join them.

overlayList.endAnnotation: Note: you can force one theme to the OBS source by adding ?force=%key% at the end of the URL, like {url}/overlay?force={selected}

confirmDisableTwitch.description: Are you sure you want to disable all the features related to Twitch, i.e. alerts but also the "latest follower" and "latest subscriber"?
confirmDisableTwitch.error: An error occured :( Please try again later or contact us.
confirmDisableTwitch.title: Disable Twitch features

confirmEnableTwitch.description: To benefit from the Twitch features, you must authorize the app to access a some information on your Twitch account (subscribers, followers).
confirmEnableTwitch.error: An error occured :( Please try again later or contact us.
confirmEnableTwitch.notice: Important: Make sure you setup this app to use the same email address as your Twitch account.
confirmEnableTwitch.title: Enable Twitch features

twitchLoginBtn.missingConfig: The project is missing some configuration (Twitch Client ID and/or Client Secret) and so won't be able to connect to Twitch.

admin.error: Something is wrong here: it looks like you need to authorize the app to access some features for Twitch, yet some configuration (Twitch Client ID and/or Client Secret) is missing.
admin.reauthenticateTwitch: Welp, we need to (re)authorize the app on Twitch

alerts.description: For each type of alert, you can set several custom messages, gifs and sounds that will be displayed randomly:
alerts.title: Alerts configuration

index.discordDescription: Please select the voice chat for the Discord bot:
index.discordDisabled: You need to turn the "voice chat" switch on to enable this feature.
index.overlayThemeDescription: Choose the style for the widgets in your overlay:
index.socialLinksDescription: You can set up to 4 social links that will be shown nicely in the overlay.
index.twitchDescription: You can choose which alerts you want to get and configure them!
index.twitchEnableText: Display your latest follower and subscriber, and get Halo-themed alerts for your stream!
index.twitchMissingConfig: The project is missing some configuration so allow this.
index.waitingScreensDescription: Please note that, contrary to the other features, each "waiting screen" has its own source URL.
